title: Wierd lag spiking
body: First game of the day that i would get into silver 2 i get this wierd lag that happens everysecond from 30 ping to 450. It made me go mad because the game was so winnable. First time its ever happened and i just wanted to fucking break my keyboard after that happened because its a waste of a game. I quit the game and joined but still was cancer so i rq and went back to playing minecraft
